statements: DELETE FROM WorkoutRoutine WHERE id = 1 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WorkoutRoutine WHERE exercise_name = 'Bench Press' AND sets = 4 AND reps = 10;
DELETE FROM WorkoutRoutine WHERE weight > 50 AND date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM workout_routines WHERE routine_name = 'Leg Day';
DELETE FROM workout_progress WHERE routine_id = 3 AND progress_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM workout_progress WHERE routine_id IN (SELECT routine_id FROM workout_routines WHERE workout_duration_minutes < 30);
DELETE FROM workout_log WHERE sets < 3 AND reps < 10;
DELETE FROM exercise_logs WHERE sets_completed = 0 AND reps_completed = 0;
DELETE FROM progress_tracking WHERE weight > 100 AND body_fat < 15.0;
